name: 黃希敏
objective: 應用語言學是語言學與意義認知、外語教學法、社會調查等學門之間的介面。本課程涵括：1)介紹西方應用語言學門所探索的種種議題；2) 討論語言學裡最具國際溝通應用價值的幾個學門，如：語意學、語用學、外語習得/教學法、言談分析、社會語用學、語言與文化等。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction: Speech on Applied linguistics
2.　　Applied linguistics
3.　　Prescribing and describing:
popular and academic views of “correctness”
4.　　Languages in the contemporary world
5.　　English Language Teaching
6.　　Language and communication
7.　　Context and culture
8.　　DEPT. CONFERENCE
9.　　Persuasion and poetics; rhetoric and resistance
10.　　MIDTERM + Past, present, and future directions
11.　　Synopsis: Semantics + presentations
12.　　Synopsis: Pragmatics + presentations
13.　　Synopsis: Discourse Analysis + presentations
14.　　Synopsis : Presentation + AIT FIELD TRIP
15.　　NEW YEAR HOLIDAY
16.　　Synopsis : Neurolinguistics + presentations
17.　　Synopsis : Sociolinguistics + presentations 
18.　　FINAL
materials:
1. Cook, Guy. (2003). Applied Linguistics (Oxford University Press)
2. Yule, George (1996). The Study of Language; 2 edition  (Cambridge University Press)
3. Handouts from Hwang (2009) SOS: A Model of Lexical Pragmatics in English for Chinese-Speaking Learners (Pearson and Longman)
